TopicTitle: Twitch Thursdays: Don't Miss Friday's Squadcast

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_nb1luwkbdZ1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=Squadcast%2521%2Bfighting%2Bmisbehaving%2Bprograms%252C%2Bone%2Bstream%2Bat%2Ba%2Btime%2521&channel=ksptv&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&archive_id=560904791"></object></p>

<p>Good ‘ol Maxmaps has been trickling 0.25 info on <a href="http://bit.ly/1knMaSg"><strong>Squadcast</strong></a> over the last few weeks. Tomorrow’s episode appears to be less a trickle and more a downpour. Expect an “info dump,” in Max’s words, tomorrow on Squadcast. If you missed last Friday’s edition, it’s right here for your viewing pleasure.</p>
